entry.title: Elastic Two-Body Sudakov Decomposition
entry.summary: The outgoing two-body Sudakov decomposition restricted to elastic kinematics in the Scalars Toy Model.

entry.title: Elastic Kinematics in Scalars Toy Model
entry.summary: Elastic kinematics for a four-point process in the Scalars Toy Model.

entry.title: One-Loop Contributions in Scalars Toy Model
entry.summary: One-loop contributions to elastic four-point amplitudes in Scalars Toy Model.

entry.title: The Scalars Toy Model
entry.summary: Introducing the toy model with scalar quanta that I will study later.

entry.title: Outgoing Two-Body Sudakov Decomposition

entry.summary: Generalizing the commutator and anticommutator of two 2-arrays to 3-arrays.

entry.title: The Triangle Product with NumPy
entry.summary: An implementation of the triangle product for 3-arrays in NumPy.
